last_phrase: In conclusion, ancient forms of magic involve a danger to the personal sense of identity, as well as the risk of losing oneself to external influences. The concept of the totem and the double is an experience that emphasizes the idea of being part of a larger collective entity, where the individual identity is temporary. It is important to understand the risks and take precautions when practicing these forms of magic to ensure the protection of one's own personal identity.
